ðŸ“– Summary: RetroAssembly is a web-based retro game collection cabinet that allows users to play classic games from various consoles directly in their browser. It features automatic box art detection, save synchronization, rewind functionality (for some emulators), spatial navigation, visual enhancements via shaders, and on-screen virtual controllers.
